main event: A civilian observed a large blue-black silhouette object with two distinct red lights on the underside, which descended, hovered, and then rapidly disappeared from view.
interesting points: The object was described as having 3 to 4 balls of white light that grew brighter as it descended.
The object hovered for 5 minutes before rapidly disappearing from view.
The disappearance and appearance of the object were both very fast.
No sound was noticed during the observation.
Only one observer reported the sighting, but the report was considered reliable.
sighted object: a large blue-black silhouette object with two distinct red lights on the underside
location: Jackson County, Missouri - Kansas City, Missouri
